subject: fix: correct notification icon states and add Android web dual-layer instructions
body:
- Fix notification bell icon to show correct state:
  - undetermined state now shows ðŸ”• (was incorrectly showing ðŸ””)
  - granted state shows ðŸ”” (enabled)
  - denied state shows ðŸ”• (blocked)
- Add Android-specific dual-layer notification instructions:
  - Android Chrome/Edge: system settings + browser permissions
  - Android Firefox: system settings + browser permissions
  - Mirrors iOS Safari's existing dual-layer approach
title: correct notification icon states and add Android web dual-layer instructions
